sentences.sContent: I had got infantile paralysis since I was four years old. The disease had been torturing me. My heart sank.
sentences.sCn: 四岁起，我就患了小儿麻痹症，忍受著病魔的摧残折磨，弱小的心灵笼罩著可怕的阴影。

sentences.sContent: Jeff: Who would think that he used to live in a wheelchair and that infantile paralysis made him unable to enjoy a normal life.
sentences.sCn: 杰夫：谁能想到他曾经是在轮椅上度日的残疾人，小儿麻痹使他不能享受正常人的生活。

sentences.sContent: From the mouth person, the taste receives evilly evilly, easy to have dysentery, cholera, the hepatitis, the infantile paralysis and so on fashionable disease.
sentences.sCn: 邪从口人，脾胃受邪，易于发生痢疾、霍乱、肝炎、小儿麻痹症等时行疾病。

synos.tran: [医]小儿麻痹症；[内科]脊髓灰质炎
